slogan: Find Wi-Fi & eSIM, stay connected anywhere!
hero_subtitle: Discover free Wi-Fi, affordable eSIMs, and secure connections worldwide.
offline_message: You are offline. Some features may be limited.

features.wifi_desc: Locate free or secure Wi-Fi hotspots nearby with geolocation or tags.
features.esim_desc: Find the best eSIM plans for your travel needs by region or country.

features.gamification_desc: Gain TRAVEL points, badges, and leaderboard ranks.
